name: search_files_contents_contain_keywords
description: Search for files in a directory that contain all specified keywords.

directory.description: The path to the directory where the search will be performed. Defaults to the current directory if not specified.

keywords.description: A list of keywords to search for. Only files containing all these keywords will be returned.

file_extension.description: The file extension to filter files by (e.g., '.txt'). If not specified, all file types will be considered.

max_size_mb.description: The maximum file size in MB to include in the search. Files larger than this size will be skipped. Defaults to 1 MB.
